mapper.sql: id, name, classify, classify_name, sub_classify, sub_classify_name, username, level, duration, study_count, weight

id,
name,
classify,
classify_name,

mapper.update:
update t_course
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
classify = #{classify,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
classify_name = #{classifyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sub_classify = #{subClassify,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sub_classify_name = #{subClassifyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
level = #{level,jdbcType=BIT},
duration = #{duration,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
study_count = #{studyCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
weight = #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER},
brief = #{brief,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_course set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, classify = #{classify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, classify_name = #{classifyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sub_classify = #{subClassify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sub_classify_name = #{subClassifyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, level = #{level,jdbcType=BIT}, duration = #{duration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, study_count = #{studyCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, weight = #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, brief = #{brief,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
